body:
```
$ spack find -dp
usage: spack find [-h] [-s | -p | -d] [-l] [-L] [-f] [-e | -E] [-u] [-m] [-v]
                  [-M] [-N]
                  [constraint [constraint ...]]
spack find: error: argument -p/--paths: not allowed with argument -d/--deps
```
Why not?
title: spack find: error: argument -p/--paths: not allowed with argument -d/--deps
